footer.aboutText: Discover more about Sorriso, our mission to provide world-class dental services, and how we aim to improve your dental health.

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.introductionContent: We take your privacy seriously. This policy explains how we handle your personal data and what steps we take to ensure your information is secure.
privacyPolicy.informationWeCollectContent: We collect various types of information to provide you with the best service. This includes:
privacyPolicy.informationWeCollectItem1: Personal identification details like name and email address.
privacyPolicy.informationWeCollectItem2: Billing information such as credit card details.
privacyPolicy.informationWeCollectItem3: Health-related data necessary for your dental treatment.
privacyPolicy.howWeUseInformationContent: Your information is used to improve our services and provide you with the best experience. Specifically, we use your data for:
privacyPolicy.howWeUseInformationItem2: Processing payments and managing your account.
privacyPolicy.dataSecurityContent: We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your personal data from unauthorized access, alteration, or destruction. Rest assured, your information is in safe hands.

testimonialsHero.title: Our Satisfied Patients
testimonialsHero.description: Hear from our patients about their experiences and the high-quality care they received.

sheilaPeterson.description: I was always self-conscious about my smile, but after receiving the Hollywood Smile treatment at Sorriso, I feel confident and proud of my teeth. The results are amazing!

lauraBastone.description: The team at Sorriso made me feel at ease, and my dental implant procedure was a complete success. I'm so happy with the results!

lelaKovacMajcevski.description: I wanted a brighter smile, and Sorriso delivered! My teeth whitening treatment was quick, painless, and the results are stunning.

marryDianaJones.description: I had orthodontic issues, but Sorriso’s professional team helped me achieve a perfect smile with their orthodontic treatment. Highly recommended!
